welcomeMessage: Welcome to the most simple QR Code Generator you can find
enterText: Enter the text you want to convert to a QR code.
tooltip: No tracking. No login or subscription. We don't store or process any data.

textUrl.placeholder: Type a text or an URL...

preview.dummyText: Your QR code will appear here as soon as you enter text or a URL.

download.downloadFormat: Select a format and click 'Download' to download the QR code.
